When you check/uncheck an item and the validating selection starts it always ends in an NPE.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.ReviewPage$TreeContentProvider.getParent(ReviewPage.java:177)

	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.ReviewPage.access$29(ReviewPage.java:1438)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.ReviewPage$13.run(ReviewPage.java:830)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 104795 ***
